mapper.insert: insert into tbl_group(gno, g_name, excercise_type, g_attend, g_intro, g_location, g_pic, g_leader) values(#{gno}, #{g_name}, #{excercise_type}, #{g_attend},#{g_intro}, #{g_location}, #{g_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{g_leader})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_group order by gno desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_group_join(jno, gno, userid) values(seq_group_jno.nextval, #{gno}, #{userid})
mapper.update: update tbl_group set g_present = g_present + #{cnt} where gno = #{gno}
mapper.select: select userid from tbl_group_join where gno = #{gno}
select * from tbl_group where gno in (select gno from tbl_group_join where userid = #{userid})
select * from tbl_group order by g_attend - g_present
select nickname from tbl_user where userid in (select userid from tbl_group_join where gno = #{gno}) order by nickname
